data.name: SOK PRO OFF
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2003220/


About the Game

SOK PRO OFF is not an actual DLC. All functionality is already in the game!

You no longer need to install this add-on.
All offline functionality has been added to the main SOK PRO game.
This update already has all the offline features:
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1399300/view/2970675385927120219

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel / AMD 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Required: Keyboard, Mouse. Supported: 2560x1440/1920x1080 fullscreen. Windowed: 1920x1080/1600x900/1366x768/1280x720/1024x576/854x480/640x360/432x240
